articles.author: Samantha Lewis
articles.title: Obrigado, Marta — Brazilian legend makes way for the future after Paris Olympics final
articles.description: Having watched her young teammates battle through to an Olympic final, football's greatest leaves Brazil in a far better place than when she found it.
articles.content:
As she stepped up onto the podium at the Parc des Princes, hand-in-hand with teammates half her age, Marta, the captain of Brazil, looked out across the pitch and, with a deep breath, smiled.
The co… [+8951 chars]

articles.title: Emma Hayes: Olympics football gold with USA 'greatest moment' of career for former Chelsea manager
articles.description: Emma Hayes says winning Olympic football gold with the United States is "the greatest moment" of her managerial career.
articles.content:
When the final whistle blew, Hayes was overcome with emotion as she embraced her staff on the touchline before jumping up and down in celebration with her players.

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
